commit message: Improved folder choose activity to match material design guidelines
On adding a cover check for the available memory and load only if the image is not boo large
Return correct duration, so seeking on large file wont faile because of too large files
Updated folder chooser layout to match material spec for lists
Use material dialog input for changing bookmark title and update material dialogs
Added option to auto rewind and use preference categories
Correctly calculate buttons with new padding of 8 instead of 4 dp
